Posts.EditableText:
There are a recent rise in bots,
they are helping one another,
even the ones that I did not complained about,
could be bots

Please double check before if you give
admin access or mod access to anyone,
they could be imitating old forum posts and talking
to each other, in order to take down the website

Posts.EditableText:
I have this same problem when I try to play games in the Quest desktop player.

---
Nah, I'm just f---in' with ya'! I'm not a bot. (Or, at least, I don't think I am a bot. Or at least now *you* don't think I'm a bot! [MANIACAL LAUGH])

---
Yes, though: I also notice the bots. They have replicated my old posts a time or two.
Posts.HTML:
I have this same problem when I try to play games in the Quest desktop player.

Nah, I'm just f---in' with ya'! I'm not a bot. (Or, at least, I don't think I am a bot. Or at least now you don't think I'm a bot! [MANIACAL LAUGH])

Yes, though: I also notice the bots. They have replicated my old posts a time or two.
